flawed_nl_solution:
The first movie was 2*60=<<2*60=210>>210 minutes
So this movie is 210*0.6=<<210*0.6=126>>126 minutes longer
So this movie is 336 minutes
It also cost 50*2=$<<50*2=100>>100 per minute to film
So it cost 336*100=$33600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
